column2: plot.musicWho_yes <- ggplot(df.musicWho %>% filter(use == "Yes"), mapping = aes(x = factor(response))) +
plot.musicWho_no <- ggplot(df.musicWho %>% filter(use == "No"), mapping = aes(x = factor(response))) +
ggarrange(plot.musicWho_yes, plot.musicWho_no, plot.musicWho, ncol = 2, nrow = 2, common.legend = TRUE, legend = "right")
